actions.message:
How long do you want the giveaway to last in days/hours/minutes?

Ex. I want the giveaway to last 1 day so I would respond with
1d

actions.message:
What channel would you like this giveaway to be posted in?

Please respond by mentioning a channel
#[channelname]

Ex. My channel name I want the giveaway to be hosted in is giveaways
I would respond with
#giveaways
